results.title: Metformin: new applications for an old drug.
results.text_hl: There is evidence of the beneficial effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in @DISEASE_Colorectal_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D015179 @@@colorectal cancer@@@, early-stage @DISEASE_Prostatic_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D011471 @@@prostate cancer@@@, @DISEASE_Breast_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D001943 @@@breast cancer@@@, @DISEASE_Urethral_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D014523 @@@urothelial cancer@@@, @DISEASE_Hematologic_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D019337 @@@blood cancer@@@, @DISEASE_Melanoma @DISEASE_MESH:D008545 @@@melanoma@@@, and @<m>DISEASE_Bone_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001859 @@@bone cancer@@@, suggesting @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ as a potent anti-@DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@tumor@@@ agent.

citations.NLM: Naseri A, Sanaie S, Hamzehzadeh S, Seyedi-Sahebari S, Hosseini MS, Gholipour-Khalili E, Rezazadeh-Gavgani E, Majidazar R, Seraji P, Daneshvar S, Rezazadeh-Gavgani E. Metformin: new applications for an old drug. J Basic Clin Physiol Pharmacol. 2022 Dec 7;():. PMID: 36474458
